result.eng: Is that the woman who left you?
result.ga: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.orig: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.html: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uaitIs that the woman who left you?
result.ponchtml: An í sin an ḃean a d'imiġ uaitIs that the woman who left you?

result.html: Bean ghránna íShe is an ugly woman.
result.ponchtml: Bean ġránna íShe is an ugly woman.

result.ga: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.orig: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.html: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh túWhich woman will you marry?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bean a ṗósfaiḋ túWhich woman will you marry?

result.html: Cé hí seoWho is this {woman}?
result.ponchtml: Cé hí seoWho is this {woman}?

result.eng: I asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ga: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.orig: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.html: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bheanI asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ponchtml: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an ḃeanI asked the woman for a glass of water.

result.eng: I found out that he has another woman!
result.ga: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aige
result.orig: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aige
result.html: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aigeI found out that he has another woman!
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé amaċ go ḃfuil bean eile aigeI found out that he has another woman!

result.html: Is bean lách íShe's a pleasant woman.
result.ponchtml: Is bean láċ íShe's a pleasant woman.

result.eng: She is an old woman now.
result.html: Is seanbhean anois íShe is an old woman now.
result.ponchtml: Is seanḃean anois íShe is an old woman now.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.orig: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.html: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.
result.ponchtml: Tá trua agam don ḃean ḃoċt a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.ga: Is í an bhean sin a mháthair
result.orig: Is í an bhean sin a mháthair
result.html: Is í an bhean sin a mháthairThat woman is his mother.
result.ponchtml: Is í an ḃean sin a ṁáṫairThat woman is his mother.

result.eng: And who is this? [assuming it's a woman]
result.html: Agus cé hí seoAnd who is this? [assuming it's a woman]
result.ponchtml: Agus cé hí seoAnd who is this? [assuming it's a woman]

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: The old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ga: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.orig: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.html: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbheanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá amaċ an scéalaí an tseanḃeanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.

result.eng: Pursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ga: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.orig: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.html: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ponchtml: A ḋ'iarraiḋ mná naċ raiḃ toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: Ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
